sentences.pinyin: Zhè shì wǒ de jiāxiāng de xiàn.
sentences.translation: This is the county of my hometown.

sentences.simplifiedText: 我所在的县是全省展现出最快发展势头的县。
sentences.traditionalText: 我所在的縣是全省展現出最快發展勢頭的縣。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ suǒ zài de xiàn shì quán shěng zhǎn xiàn chū zuì kuài fāzhǎn shì tóu de xiàn.
sentences.translation: The county I live in shows the fastest development momentum in the whole province.
